attributes.action: Hold to account those within the UK who deliberately undermine it's democracy.
attributes.background: Since the referendum result to leave the EU it has become ever more apparent that certain UK institutions and public services do not have the best interests of the general public at heart and are overtly and actively seeking to undermine the UK's democratic values.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
